isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CAB - TILT: 9600 AND 9700 SLEEPER AND NON-SLEEPER CABS - MAINTENANCE AIR WIPER MOTOR

svcproc.title: MAINTENANCE AIR WIPER MOTOR
svcproc.para: Service on the windshield wiper system is limited to the replacement of faulty components. However, wiper motor cover may be removed for cleaning. Internal parts which may be replaced are the internal valve, shuttle, O-ring, and kicker. Complete disassembly of the motor is not recommended.

caution.para: Do not use de-greasing or hydrocarbon solvents when cleaning the air motor housing and cover since this will remove oil from housing and cover bearings.

svcproc.para:
When attaching cover, lubricate paddle cavity and valve chamber with a high pressure type lubricant (Trico Wiper Lubricant No. 23-8 or equivalent). Also, lightly coat flat mating surface of cover on paddle cavity side with Permatex #2. Install and tighten cover screws in a cross pattern. Install and tighten the valve cover to the specifications listed in the TORQUE CHART
.
Install back pressure valve by applying wrench pressure to main body hex for tightening. Check motor for correct operation at 70 psi.
